snippet.title: Extremely Powerful Capybaras - Release Date & Online Multiplayer Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
[Aug 30 UPDATE!!] This game is now scheduled for December 5th. Join friends online in this free demo while we get everything ready:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2526720/Extremely_Powerful_Capybaras_Training_Grounds/?beta=1

Extremely Powerful Capybaras brings a unique twist to the horde-mode survival gaming genre with its robust roguelite elements. Supporting up to four players locally, strive together to defeat fearsome foes and bosses to become the world's greatest capybaras! Survive a run to earn Capyblessings which boost your stats permanently (future runs as well!) and accumulate CapyCoins and CapyTokens which are used to unlock upgrades to your weapon and ability passives, and class abilities respectively.
